document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">thoughts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">dont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">words </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">day </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">time </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">signal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">esoteric </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">sips </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">communion </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Wine </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">while </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">taste </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">native </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seems </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">easy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">You </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cannot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">comprehend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">price </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">infrequency </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Your thoughts dont have words every day
